Collector Yumi: Master Chaos was the tragic genius of the Black Anvil Guild. He had an amazing gift for making golems, even as a young boy. Such a prodigy! He was the student of Master Tarziph, the famous creator of the Siege Golems. But he never received the recognition his genius probably deserved.
